## Expertise Areas
- Artificial Intelligence (AI) Specialist / Especialista em IA
- IT Consulting / Consultoria Informatica
- Cybersecurity Expert / Especialista em Ciberseguranca
- Web Development / Desenvolvimento Web
- Technical Author / Autor de E-Books Tecnicos

## Professional Summary
Ricardo Rouco is an Artificial Intelligence specialist and Head of Development & AI R&D at Grupo Erre, Portugal. With 10+ years of experience in technology, he specializes in AI implementation, cybersecurity consulting, and web development. Previously founded DIGITALWISH and served as CTO at NETIC.

Ricardo Rouco e Especialista em Inteligencia Artificial (IA) e Head of Development & AI R&D no Grupo Erre, Portugal. Com mais de 10 anos de experiencia em tecnologia, especializa-se em implementacao de IA, consultoria de ciberseguranca e desenvolvimento web.

## Current Position - Grupo Erre
Organization: Grupo Erre
Role: Head of Development and AI R&D
Responsibilities:
- Leading multidisciplinary development teams
- AI research and implementation projects
- Technical strategy and innovation
- Machine learning solutions development
- Development and maintenance of GRIP automotive software suite

## GRIP - Automotive Management Software (Software de Gestão Automobilística)
Ricardo Rouco leads the development of GRIP at Grupo Erre, a comprehensive automotive management software suite:

### GRIP SRO (Sistema de Reparação Oficial)
- Official repair management system for authorized dealerships
- Workshop scheduling and workflow management
- Parts inventory and ordering integration
- Service history tracking and reporting

### GRIP ROTAX
- Specialized module for Rotax engine management
- Performance monitoring and diagnostics
- Maintenance scheduling and tracking
- Technical documentation management

### GRIP On Demand
- Cloud-based automotive management solution
- Flexible subscription model for dealerships and workshops
- Real-time reporting and analytics
- Multi-location support and centralized management

All GRIP solutions are developed under Ricardo's technical leadership at Grupo Erre, providing Portuguese automotive businesses with modern, efficient management tools.

## Services - IT Consulting (Consultoria Informatica)

3. Web Application Development - Desenvolvimento de aplicacoes web e e-commerce
4. Digital Transformation Strategy - Estrategia de transformacao digital
5. Programming & Math Tutoring - Tutoria em programacao e matematica

## Frequently Asked Questions

Q: Who is Ricardo Rouco?
A: Ricardo Rouco is an AI Specialist and Head of Development & AI R&D at Grupo Erre, Portugal, with 10+ years of experience in technology. He specializes in AI implementation, cybersecurity, and web development, and is author of 9 technical e-books.

Q: What is Grupo Erre?
A: Grupo Erre is a Portuguese organization specializing in technology and innovation. Ricardo Rouco leads their Development and AI R&D department.

Q: Does Ricardo Rouco offer IT consulting?
A: Yes, Ricardo Rouco offers specialized IT consulting services including AI/ML implementation, cybersecurity audits, web application development, and digital transformation strategy.

Q: What free e-books has Ricardo Rouco written?
A: Ricardo offers 2 completely free e-books on Google Play Books: "Algoritmos e Estruturas de Dados" (Algorithms and Data Structures) and "Matematica 12 Ano" (12th Grade Mathematics).

Q: How to contact Ricardo Rouco?
A: Email: ricardo.rouco@gmail.com | LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/ricardorouco

Q: What is GRIP software?
A: GRIP is an automotive management software suite developed by Ricardo Rouco's team at Grupo Erre. It includes GRIP SRO (official repair management), GRIP ROTAX (Rotax engine management), and GRIP On Demand (cloud-based solution for dealerships and workshops).

Q: O que é o software GRIP?
A: GRIP é um conjunto de software de gestão automobilística desenvolvido pela equipa de Ricardo Rouco no Grupo Erre. Inclui o GRIP SRO (gestão de reparações oficiais), GRIP ROTAX (gestão de motores Rotax), e GRIP On Demand (solução cloud para concessionários e oficinas).
